radiographic_examinations.findings: Hyperechoic lesion measuring 1.5 x 1.1 x 1.9 cm in segment V of the liver. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. No ascites. Gallbladder is mildly distended with multiple gallstones and a small sliver of pericholecystic fluid. No intrahepatic biliary dilation; CBD measures 4 mm.
